juanyuk.photoalbum.view

Class SlideshowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • juanyuk.photoalbum.view.Controller

  • public class SlideshowController
extends Controller
    Controller for the Slideshow window.
    Author:
    yuky, jmm754

    • Constructor Detail

      • SlideshowController

        public SlideshowController()

    • Method Detail

      • backButtonClicked

        public void backButtonClicked()
        Method to call when "Back" button is clicked. Exits the slide show screen and returns to the photos screen.

      • previousButtonClicked

        public void previousButtonClicked()
        Method to call when the "Previous" button is clicked. Starts the slideshow window with the photo that comes before the current displayed photo, if the current photo is the first photo in the album, then the slideshow displays the last photo in the album.

      • nextButtonClicked

        public void nextButtonClicked()
        Method to call when the "Next" button is clicked. Starts the slideshow window with the photo that comes after the current displayed photo, if the current photo is the last photo in the album, then the slideshow displays the first photo in the album.

      • editButtonClicked

        public void editButtonClicked()
        Method to call when the "Edit" button is clicked. Shows the show edit photo dialog.

      • init

        public void init(java.lang.Object obj,
                 int index)
        Initializes the layout of the Slideshow Window.
        Specified by:
        init in class Controller
        Parameters:
        obj - Album that the slideshow is displaying
        index - index of the photo in the album

      • updateSlideshow

        public void updateSlideshow()
        Updates the slideshow image along with the details of the currently displayed photo.
